title: An Underground Community Of Hash Oil 'Craftsmen'
teaser: NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Mike Sager, who wrote for California Sunday Magazine about the makers of a marijuana concentrate called "hash oil." Using hash oil is legal in some states; making it isn't.
contentencoded:
NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Mike Sager, who wrote for California Sunday Magazine about the makers of a marijuana concentrate called "hash oil." While using hash oil is legal in some states, making it is not.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
